unnormalised: Home Loan Schemes Galore! Are You Ready to Buy That Dream House?
normalised: home loan schemes galore are you ready to buy that dream house

unnormalised: Thinking of finally ditching that rental in Mumbai and buying your own place? Well, now might be the perfect time! Banks are rolling out some seriously tempting home loan schemes, just in time for Diwali!
normalised: thinking of finally ditching that rental in Mumbai and buying your own place Well now might be the perfect time Banks are rolling out some seriously tempting home loan schemes just in time for Diwali

unnormalised: SBI's "Ghar Apna" scheme boasts interest rates starting at just 8.5% - lower than your chai addiction costs you monthly! HDFC is offering quick approvals, sometimes in as little as 48 hrs. Don't forget ICICI Bank's festive bonanza, waiving processing fees until 31/10/2024.
normalised: S B I's "Ghar Apna" scheme boasts interest rates starting at just eight point five percent - lower than your chai addiction costs you monthly H D F C is offering quick approvals sometimes in as little as forty eight hours Don't forget I C I C I Bank's festive bonanza waiving processing fees until thirty first October two thousand and twenty four

unnormalised: Plus, PMAY (Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana) is still around, helping first-time buyers from lower-income groups get subsidies. Imagine, owning that 2BHK in Navi Mumbai for less than you thought!
normalised: Plus P M A Y (Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana) is still around helping first-time buyers from lower-income groups get subsidies Imagine owning that two B H K in Navi Mumbai for less than you thought

unnormalised: Heard about the new scheme from Canara Bank launching on 16/10/2024 at 11:00 hrs? Apparently, they're offering Rs. 5 lakhs off for homes within 5 km of metro stations. Talk about convenient!
normalised: Heard about the new scheme from Canara Bank launching on sixteenth October two thousand and twenty four at eleven zero zero hours Apparently they're offering rupees five lakhs off for homes within five kilometer of metro stations Talk about convenient

unnormalised: Remember to shop around and compare offers, folks. Don't get swayed by just one ad. Get your documents ready (PAN card, Aadhar, salary slips - the usual drill) and get pre-approved. Time to become a ghar-wala this Diwali! Don't delay, the best offers disappear faster than jalebis on Dussehra! Good luck!
normalised: Remember to shop around and compare offers folks Don't get swayed by just one ad Get your documents ready (P A N card Aadhar salary slips - the usual drill) and get pre-approved Time to become a ghar-wala this Diwali Don't delay the best offers disappear faster than jalebis on Dussehra Good luck
